answers.answer: I had to fast for 12 hours before my test. If you don't have to fast, just don't eat or drink anything with sugar.  That's all you can really do.
There isnt much you can do... try to relax though! Good luck!
Don't eat or drink anything for 12 hours

It's not that bad, I was afraid I was going to fail mine because I kept getting dizzy and light headed, turns out I was just anemic, lol. Though that is a problem on its own, it is much easier to remedy. :) don't worry about it, if you do have G.D. then it's a good thing for the doctor to find it so he/she can Eeep you and baby safe! Good luck!
Oh and if you do mess up and fail it, they will do the 3 hour test to double check, and that one is more accurate.

question: So I have a doc appointment tomorrow to do the gestational diabetes test and I don't know how I am supposed to prepare for that to make sure I pass. Any thoughts? I just don't want to go and fail it and not know what I did wrong. someone plz help me. I need to calm down and have no stress...
title: scared and nervous
